text: Thank you <@U01QVR44MEY> :grinning: Great help. Let me try this method.
of course, let me know how it goes

Hi there -- just chiming in to share our frustrations with CBEs as well. We're sending a ton of rich event data in (via Segment, same stuff that lands in Amplitude), but it seems like it's basically impossible to use the properties on those CBEs to actually drive a workflow or be part of an email template.

What I can't figure out is if we're just doing it wrong and should be using something else ("forms"?).
